title: How to Remove Small Dents from a Car Body

steps.title: Get a small clean drain plunger.
steps.content: Get a small clean drain plunger. Use the simple style of plunger without the flange in the bottom. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Clean the body of the car so that it is free from grease and dirt.
steps.content: Clean the body of the car so that it is free from grease and dirt.

steps.title: Put a bit of soapy water on the rim of the plunger, not too much.
steps.content: Put a bit of soapy water on the rim of the plunger, not too much. This will help the plunger create suction against the clean car body.

steps.title: Attach it to the car body over the dent.
steps.content: Attach it to the car body over the dent. Create an adequate amount of suction.

steps.title: Slowly pull the plunger until the dent is gone.
steps.content: Slowly pull the plunger until the dent is gone. [2] X Research source
